Simulators package¶

Submodules¶

Simulators.CTD module¶

CTDSimulator module simulates the true field.

class Simulators.CTD.CTD(loc_start: numpy.ndarray = numpy.array, random_seed: int = 0, sigma: float = 1.0, nugget: float = 0.1)¶

Bases: object

CTD module handles the simulated truth value at each specific location.

get_ctd_data(loc: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray¶

Simulate CTD data gathering. :param loc: np.array([x, y])

Returns:

np.array([x, y, sal])

Return type:

dataset

get_ctd_data_1hz(loc: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray¶

Simulate CTD data gathering at 1hz. It means that it returns only one sample. :param loc: np.array([x, y])

Returns:

np.array([x, y, sal])

Return type:

data

get_ground_truth() → numpy.ndarray¶

Return ground truth.

salinity value at loc
